Sentencas: A novel hybrid power generation system integrating biomass gasification, solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC), gas expanders (GE) and the Kalina cycle (MC) was proposed for analysis.
Titulo: Investigation on performance of an integrated SOFC-GE-KC power generation system using gaseous fuel from biomass gasification

Sentencas: The hybrid system with CO2 capture represents an efficient and sustainable alternative to conventional distributed power plants.
Titulo: Investigation on performance of an integrated SOFC-GE-KC power generation system using gaseous fuel from biomass gasification

Sentencas: A clean gaseous fuel from a mature and commercialized biomass gasifier was fed to the SOFC stack, and its thermal energy was utilized to the extreme by gas expanders and the KC.
Titulo: Investigation on performance of an integrated SOFC-GE-KC power generation system using gaseous fuel from biomass gasification

Sentencas: The proposed hybrid system was investigated by building a complete system-level model based on uniting zero-dimensional components models.
Titulo: Investigation on performance of an integrated SOFC-GE-KC power generation system using gaseous fuel from biomass gasification

Sentencas: Performance evaluation of the hybrid system was presented by performing energy and exergy analyses of the subunits and overall system.
Titulo: Investigation on performance of an integrated SOFC-GE-KC power generation system using gaseous fuel from biomass gasification

Sentencas: The results showed that an energy efficiency of 64.2% for the hybrid system was got based on the lower heating value (LHV) of the gaseous fuel in a baseline operating condition.
Titulo: Investigation on performance of an integrated SOFC-GE-KC power generation system using gaseous fuel from biomass gasification

Sentencas: The analysis on exergy destruction in the main subunits indicated a potential for improvement in performance of the proposed system.
Titulo: Investigation on performance of an integrated SOFC-GE-KC power generation system using gaseous fuel from biomass gasification

Sentencas: For better understanding of the hybrid system, a study on parametric trends was presented to specify the best parameter ranges for system operation.
Titulo: Investigation on performance of an integrated SOFC-GE-KC power generation system using gaseous fuel from biomass gasification
Investigation on performance of an integrated SOFC-GE-KC power generation system using gaseous fuel from biomass gasification
